oai_dc:dc.dc:title: GMO, organic and conventional production: opportunities and threats of co-existence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the study is to analyse institutional, economic and social factors that are relevant in the context of introducing GMO products to Finnish agriculture and food chain. The focus is on the co-existence of different production alternatives (GMO, organic and conventional production).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} GMO, organic and conventional production: opportunities and threats of co-existence. [GMO-, luomu- ja tavanomaisen tuotannon rinnakkaiselon mahdollisuudet ja uhat.] Runs 2004 - 2004. Project Leader(s): Vorne, Virpi, MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
